participant_1.background: i have a dogs. i attend church every week. i'm a woman. i work as a school teacher.

participant_2.background: i eat a raw diet. i am an economics major. i just bought a house recently. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i am married with two kids.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i have two grown children who never visit.
i'm a 56 year old woman.
i fantasize about taking over the world.
i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.
i used to be pretty but time has not been kind.
